title: Related Resources
partof: manuscripts in the libraries of the greek and armenian patriarchates in jerusalem
description: A Short Bibliography of Supplementary Materials Relating to the Three Monastery Manuscript Collections     Atiya, Aziz Suryal, 1898-1988. Quarterly Journal of Current Acquisitions, vol. 10, no. 1, 1952, pp. 21–32.   Clark, Kenneth W. "Exploring the Manuscripts of Sinai and Jerusalem." The Biblical Archaeologist, vol. 16, no. 2, 1953, pp. 22–43.   Clark, Kenneth. "Microfilming Manuscripts at Jerusalem and Mt. Sinai." "Review of The Arabic manuscripts of Mount Sinai; a hand-list of the Arabic manuscripts and scrolls microfilmed at the library of the Monastery of St. Catherine, Mount Sinai."
